text.data-name: Then, one by one as they hung in the air. She caught all the wo

svg.text: Then, one by one as they hung in the air.She caught all the words, yes she DARED Then with a huff and a puff, she blew them away.The worries were gone, they could not stay. The worry-knot inside shrunk and was gone soon.

text.data-name: Inara smiled to herself. She felt calm and even a little hungr

svg.text: Inara smiled to herself.She felt calm and even a little hungry.She picked up her apple, and took big bite. She held on to the stone as she thought about school.She was ready to go to school the next day.
